parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the resource to get.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name of the resource.

nested_items.name: Expression
nested_items.description: The rule name or topic rule to send messages to.

nested_items.name: ExpressionType
nested_items.description: The type of value in Expression.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM Role that authorizes the destination.
